name: getcurrentbyvaluegrowthmomentum
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool earningsdata.
Tool description: Get upcoming and historic earnings data for stocks! Contains historical data from 2020-05.
API description: Fetches a list of stocks based on the specified current value, growth, and momentum criteria.

momentum.description: The momentum criteria for filtering stocks.

growth.description: The growth criteria for filtering stocks.

value.description: The value criteria for filtering stocks.
